name: Camouflage and Blending
description: Methods for blending into different environments and avoiding detection.

cards.title: Natural Environment Camouflage
cards.description: Utilizing terrain and foliage to blend into outdoor environments.
cards.bulletpoints: Using shadows, breaking up silhouette, adjusting to lighting conditions

cards.title: Social Engineering Disguises
cards.description: Altering appearance and behavior to blend into social environments.
cards.bulletpoints: Changing gait, speech modulation, dressing for context
